document_data.mainbody:
inta was a member of the Shadow Druids of the Cloakwood Forest during the late 15 century DR.
She wore a simple leather harness and trousers.
While acting in secret within the Emerald Grove, Pinta took on the animal form of a large rat.
She preferred to utilize a shortbow in combat.
As of the , Pinta joined Wren and their superior Olodan on a mission to infiltrate the Emerald Grove south along the Sword Coast. Together they worked with Kagha, a trusted leader within the Emerald Enclave who ascended as archdruid in the absence of Master Halsin. They aimed to protect the grove from a growing horde of goblins and other monstrous creatures, that threatened druid enclaves across the region.
